title: Spaar
desc: This is by far my favorite dev-project. During Web App Development, we had to make a CRUD-app using React and Mongoose and JWT tokens to succesfully have authentication on the webapp. Spaar, 'save' in Dutch, is a simple money-keeping app that helps you log your incomes and expenses. If you want to log an expense, start your amount be adding a '-' in front of it.)

title: Electric Avenue
desc: Electric Avenue is a webseries produced by Leitmotiv. During the 4th semester, I got the opportunity to work on an intro and outro during class that would be presented to a real customer. At the end, I really liked it and was honored to receive positive feedback from the client.

title: Whole Earth Catalog
desc: The Whole Earth Catalog is a book all about gaining knowledge and reaching self-sufficienty. With the last edition published in 1968, would there still be people interested in a digital remake of this icon? That was the challenge that was given to us during our Cross Media Design course. The final product is a community-based IOS-app that still caputeres the essence and styling of the original book.

title: Space Survivor 9000
desc: Space Survivor 9000 is a Phaser 3 based game that I made together with a classmate during our Collaborative Development class. This was also the first project where we used Git to succesfully develop at the same time (after a few merge conflicts ofcourse ;) ) All visuals and audio were done by us using illustrator and garageband. Scores are being kept in a MySQL-database used in combination with PhP. Go on, have a go!
tools: Illustrator, Phaser3, Webpack, Php, GarageBand, Git

title: Deliveroo App
desc: This is a visualisation of the Deliveroo-app with a dynamic onboarding and walkthrough. Focus is laid on delight animation aswell as and smooth transitions.

title: Radio+
desc: Radio+ is a web-platform used to listen to flemish radiostations live aswell as on-demand. The current platform suffered from a lack of personality and structural coherence. With the adition of a like-system and personalized home page, the users would find already known and discover unkown content more effeciently.
